member.name: WICPngItxtProperties
member.summary: Specifies the Portable Network Graphics (PNG) iTXT chunk metadata properties.

member.name: WICPngItxtProperties.WICPngItxtKeyword
member.summary: [VT_LPSTR] Indicates the keywords in the iTXT metadata chunk.

member.name: WICPngItxtProperties.WICPngItxtCompressionFlag
member.summary: [VT_UI1] Indicates whether the text in the iTXT chunk is compressed. 1 if the text is compressed; otherwise, 0.

member.name: WICPngItxtProperties.WICPngItxtLanguageTag
member.summary: [VT_LPSTR] Indicates the human language used by the translated keyword and the text.

member.name: WICPngItxtProperties.WICPngItxtTranslatedKeyword
member.summary: [VT_LPWSTR] Indicates a translation of the keyword into the language indicated by the language tag.

member.name: WICPngItxtProperties.WICPngItxtText
member.summary: [VT_LPWSTR] Indicates additional text in the iTXT metadata chunk.
